text: Na kāyappacālakaṃ antaraghare nisīdissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā
edit: Na kāyappacālakaṃ antaraghare nisīdissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā

translations.transtext: 16. I will not sit swinging my body in inhabited areas: a training to be observed.
๑๖.พึงทำศึกษาว่า”เราจักไม่โยกกายนั่งในละแวกบ้าน”
16. I shall not sit fidgetting (swaying) the body in inhabited areas: this is a training to be done.
